parameters.name: CheckItemFuzzy
parameters.description: The name of the check item. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: CheckLevel
parameters.description:
The risk level. Default value: null, which indicates that check items at all risk levels are queried.Valid values:
*   **high**
*   **medium**
*   **low**

parameters.name: CheckType
parameters.description: The type of the check item.

parameters.name: CheckWarningStatus
parameters.description:
The risk status. Default value is null, meaning check items in all states are queried. Valid values:

*   **1**: failed
*   **3**: passed
*   **6**: whitelisted
*   **8**: fixed

parameters.name: CheckWarningStatusList
parameters.description: The list of risk levels. If the CheckWarningStatus parameter is specified, only it takes effect.

parameters.name: ContainerFieldName
parameters.description: The name of the field that is used to query containers.

parameters.name: ContainerFieldValue
parameters.description: The value of the field that is used to query containers.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group.

> You can call the [DescribeAllGroups](~~DescribeAllGroups~~) operation to query the IDs of asset groups.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

> We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
The data source. Default value: **default**. Valid value:

*   **agentless**: The check items of baselines for agentless detection.
*   **default**: The check items of baselines for hosts.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: Start of time range for filtering alerts, effective only for querying historically handled alerts.

parameters.name: UuidList
parameters.description:
The UUIDs of the servers.

>  You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~141932~~) operation to query the UUIDs of the servers.
